design_focus: Structural Layout, Spacing, and Component Sizing

rounding.tailwind_class: rounded-xl for major cards, rounded-full for pills/badges

padding.description: Generous vertical and horizontal internal padding.

gaps_and_margins.description: Consistent large vertical spacing between main sections.

shadows.description: Subtle elevation used to lift cards.

components.name: Bottom Navigation Bar
components.layout: Grid with 5 equal columns (grid grid-cols-5). Each item stacks icon over text (text-xs label).

components.name: QR Code Card
components.layout: Full width, rounded-xl. Content is center-aligned (flex flex-col items-center). Info icon is absolutely positioned in the top-right corner (absolute top-4 right-4).

components.name: Category Tabs/Filters
components.layout: Horizontal flex container (overflow-x-auto, whitespace-nowrap). Buttons use rounded-full and fixed internal padding (px-4 py-2).

components.name: Reward/Points Card (Grid Item)
components.layout: Used in a two-column grid (grid grid-cols-2). The image area must be a relative container. Price/Points badges (rounded-full) are absolutely positioned at the bottom-center of the image.
components.text_position: Description (text-sm) is padded and left-aligned below the image.

components.name: Deal Banner Card (Featured)
components.layout: Full width. Main product image with a large, highly stylized price graphic (magnifying glass effect) overlaid using absolute positioning. Text description is large (text-base or text-lg font-semibold) and left-aligned below the visual area.
components.price_layout: Old price is line-through (text-lg). New price is large and bold (text-2xl font-extrabold).

components.name: Status Badges (Unavailable/Locked)
components.layout: Pill-shaped (rounded-full), absolutely positioned over the center-bottom of the product image. Includes the 'Lock' icon when applicable.
